title: lovesmayfamilis
author: lovesmayfamilis
content: What happened: FAKE TEAM / STOCK PHOTOANN Thread:  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5410501.0Archive link:  https://loyce.club/archive/posts/6078/60782599.htmlProfile link:  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3375844Website link:  https://atalira.net/Archive link:  https://archive.md/XtQSTQuote Domain Name: ATALIRA.NETRegistry Domain ID: 2718466987_DOMAIN_NET-VRSNRegistrar WHOIS Server: whois.google.comRegistrar URL: http://domains.google.comUpdated Date: 2022-08-16T11:33:02ZCreation Date: 2022-08-16T11:31:15ZRegistry Expiry Date: 2023-08-16T11:31:15ZFAKE TEAM / STOCK PHOTOSocial networks are empty.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on August 22, 2022, 07:36:22 AMWhat happened: FAKE TEAM / STOCK PHOTOIt seems that they've altered those things [archived] after seeing this thread, but that wasn't the only "fake" thing when they made an announcement here [based on "your archived link", it shows they didn't even bother to change most of the content from the following "WordPress theme (archived)"]!In addition to that, their "whitepaper" perfectly shows what kind of token this is going to be [a shitty one]!

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Thanks for all these you do, sniffing out idiotic and despicable characters in this crypto space. Those scumbags are the major reason the ICO trend died a natural death barely a year it debuted, for me.Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on August 22, 2022, 07:36:22 AMSocial networks are empty.That's a big red flag for me but I know there are some people who wouldn't raise an eyebrow on that. They will say it's part of privacy ðŸ˜†

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: SFR10 on August 31, 2022, 11:33:41 AMIt seems that they've altered those things [archived] after seeing this thread, but that wasn't the only "fake" thing when they made an announcement here [based on "your archived link", it shows they didn't even bother to change most of the content from the following "WordPress theme (archived)"]!Doesn't this call for a red trust and a flag on their profile or I am being too trigger happy when it comes to red-trust since the advertising profile has not been tagged yet?

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: Mpamaegbu on September 06, 2022, 04:22:20 PMQuote from: lovesmayfamilis on August 22, 2022, 07:36:22 AMSocial networks are empty.That's a big red flag for me but I know there are some people who wouldn't raise an eyebrow on that. They will say it's part of privacy ðŸ˜†It looks like their pinned tweet received a lot of paid comments recently [archived] and if IIRC, they didn't have over 40K followers last week!Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on September 06, 2022, 10:47:45 PMDoesn't this call for a red trust and a flag on their profile or I am being too trigger happy when it comes to red-trust since the advertising profile has not been tagged yet?Oops, my bad [I forgot to paint that account]...- Tagged and "created a flag".For some reason, they've completely removed their "executive team" section

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: I was hoping that the thread manager would respond and explain why they left the team photo consisting of stock photos from the template, but there is no explanation, so we can conclude that they agree with the accusations.Other than that, it looks like they are ready to sell their token.SFR10, Thanks for creating the flag. I support.
